entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
